metadata.title: CVE-2019-5087 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in theflattenIncrementally function in the xcf2png and xcf2pnm binaries ofxcftools 1.0.7. An integer overflow can occur while calculating the row'sallocation size, that could be exploited to corrupt memory and eventuallyexecute arbitrary code. In order to trigger this vulnerability, a victimwould need to open a specially crafted XCF file.

criterions.comment: xcftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
